p.span: 1. Place the chicken, courgettes, pepper, onion and tomatoes in a­ large bowl. Add the pesto and toss ­together well.

div.p: 2. Thread onto 8 short metal skewers and grill or barbecue over a medium heat for 15-20
minutes, turning frequently until the chicken is lightly browned and cooked through with no pink meat remaining.
3. Heat the cooked grains according to pack instructions and serve with the chicken and vegetable skewers and the ­salad.
